Apapa Oworonshoki Expressway bụ nnukwu ụzọ awara awara jikọtara Apapa na Somolu site na Surulere na Mushin na Lagos. Maka ọtụtụ akụkụ ya, ọ bụ ụzọ awara awara isii nwere ụzọ abụọ na-arụ ọrụ n'otu ụzọ n'akụkụ ụzọ awara awara
Okporo ụzọ awara awara gafere okporo ụzọ awara awara ndị ọzọ dị ka Lagos-Badagry Expressway na Ikorodu Road
Ọ na-agafe Tin Can Island, ebe mbido ya na-ejikọ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Lagos

Okporo ụzọ awara awara ga-anabata ụfọdụ n'ime ọdụ BRT nke LAMATA.
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari na Nọvemba 2018 tọhapụrụ ijeri naira iri asaa na atọ iji rụọ ọrụ n'okporo ụzọ ma dozie nsogbu nke gridlock n'okporong ụzọ.
